CWEs: CWE-601: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect')
CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function is vulnerable to several types of attacks. Firstly, it is susceptible to Open Redirect attacks (CWE-601) because it uses user input to determine the redirection URL without proper validation. Secondly, it may expose sensitive information (CWE-200) through error messages. Thirdly, it does not implement any CSRF protection (CWE-352), making it vulnerable to Cross-Site Request
